title: 5TH STREET TERMINAL RENOVATION
description: Special Education Transportation (GO0) plans to renovate the 5th Street Bus Terminal located at 2115 5th Street NE, due to inadequate facilities.  The new facility will accommodate 35 work stations, and a large space to accommodate the 290 drivers and attendants.
justification: Special Education Transportationâ€™s 5th Street terminal is not equipped to support the heating, cooling, IT, and telephonic needs of the current staff.  In addition, most of the systems furniture, hardware, and desks have not been updated in more than 20 years.  The 5th Street terminal also poses potential health risks due improper ventilation and inadequate heating and cooling capacity.  The overall disrepair of the facility (e.g.; sporadic heating and cooling due to failing boiler and make-shift A/C facilities, broken windows, missing doors, and inefficient layout due to facilities original floor plan and purpose as a vehicle repair facility.)
